title: SKIMS will soon sell T-shirts, leggings, and dresses
text:
Kim Kardashian West has unveiled a new range of products as part of her shapewear brand SKIMS.

The Cotton Collection will feature T-shirts, slip dresses, leggings, bras, underwear, and tank tops.

Each piece was designed to be worn as either underwear or outerwear.

The new pieces range in price between $18 and $56. The entire collection launches October 15 on the brand's website.

Visit Insider's homepage for more stories.

Following her successful first drop selling out on the first day, Kim Kardashian has unveiled the new collection for her shapewear brand, SKIMS. Dubbed Cotton Collection, the lineup features lounge and underwear designed for maximum comfort.

Taking inspiration from some of the star's favorite pieces to wear for relaxing at home, pieces range from essential T-shirts, tanks, and leggings, to slip dresses, bras, and underwear. All products are made using soft and natural fibers in muted hues, signature to Kardashian's aesthetic.

INTRODUCING THE SKIMS COTTON COLLECTION - LAUNCHING OCT 15 AT 9AM PST / 12PM EST. @KimKardashian’s essential underwear and lounge pieces made from ultra soft cotton are coming soon! Join the waitlist now at SKIMS.COM to be the first to shop the Cotton collection before it sells out. A post shared by SKIMS (@skims) on Oct 10, 2019 at 9:02am PDT Oct 10, 2019 at 9:02am PDT

Each item can be worn as underwear or can be layered for everyday casual wear. These versatile pieces are offered in sizes ranging from XXS through 4XL, keeping to the brand's emphasis on inclusivity.

Made for lounging, at home @KimKardashian wears the Cotton Rib Tank ($34) and the Cotton Rib Boxer ($32) in Bone. Shop the Cotton Collection this Tuesday October 15 at 9AM PST / 12PM EST and join the waitlist now to be notified when it drops.
